uniqueLanguageConstraint: Only one value allowed for each language for {{ label }}.
nodeKindLiteralConstraint: The expected value for {{ label }} is a literal.
nodeKindIRIConstraint: The expected value for {{ label }} is an rdfs:Resource (URI or blank node).
codelistConstraint: Only <{{ codelist }}> values expected for {{ label }}.
minCountConstraint: Minimum {{ count }} values expected for {{ label }}.
maxCountConstraint: Maximum {{ count }} values expected for {{ label }}.
